archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0747
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As provisioning specialist, when an order reaches a certain stage, I want a customers ability to make changes to be stopped so that the order completes as it is. E.g. a customer cannot change a delivery address within x hours before dispatch of the item.

properties.value: SC, EP: Requirement clear Assumption: definition of point of no return and trigger in OSS

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
